content:
Travis seems to be having trouble with https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib/pull/797. It compiles locally, and lean --make test seems to have completed successfully on travis, but then the final "test" build errors with

$ leanpkg test
configuring mathlib 0.1
> lean --make src
No output has been received in the last 10m0s, this potentially indicates a stalled build or something wrong with the build itself.
Check the details on how to adjust your build configuration on: https://docs.travis-ci.com/user/common-build-problems/#Build-times-out-because-no-output-was-received
The build has been terminated
I've tried restarting it. Any other ideas? I'll try just pushing a no-op change?
I just re-ran it and it worked. I'm not sure why it got this far :/
